qas.question: How many girls were in the top 10 on season 12 of American Idol?
Who was the last guy to be sent home on season 12 of American Idol?
How many contestants did this season have?
How many weeks in a row were male contestants eliminated?
Who as the last man to be eliminated?
How many contestants were able to perform for two weeks without any eliminations?

context: The top <a2_0>10<a2_0/> contestants started with <a0_0><a3_0>five<a3_0/><a0_0/> males and five females, however, the males were eliminated consecutively in the first five weeks, with <a1_0><a4_0>Lazaro Arbos<a4_0/><a1_0/> the last male to be eliminated. For the first time in the show's history, the top 5 contestants were all female. It was also the first time that the judges' "save" was not used, the top <a5_0>four<a5_0/> contestants were therefore given an extra week to perform again with their votes carried over with no elimination in the first week.
